products.name: banana
products.shortDesc: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit – botanically a berry
products.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa. In some countries, bananas used for cooking may be called "plantains", distinguishing them from dessert bananas

products.name: coconut
products.shortDesc: Coconut is the fruit of the coconut palm (Cocos nucifera).
products.description: Coconut is the fruit of the coconut palm (Cocos nucifera). It's used for its water, milk, oil, and tasty meat. Coconuts have been grown in tropical regions for more than 4,500 years but recently increased in popularity for their flavor, culinary uses, and potential health benefits
